titleStmt.title: Yehovah summa totalis or, All in all, and, the same for euer: or, an addition to Mirum in modum. / By the first author, Iohn Dauies.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.
Davies, John, 1565?-1618. Mirum in modum.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iaggard in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iohn Davies of Hereford.
Title page in red and black, the first word in xylographic Hebrew characters.
With a final leaf of verse.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
